ai-patthana19.16:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in SN 45.)
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_1: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_2: if there is no cause of desire for fondness to thirst, for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_3: Quality doesn’t give rise to the teachings, both for the arrogantion, and for the sake of praise.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_4: Quality of desire, lustfulness, and resistant principles.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_5: Quality doesn’t give rise to the teachings, both for the arrogantion, and for the sake of praise.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_6: At those things that are not a cause of desire and lust ...
